<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_atf_parameter_set</collection> <condition/> <description>When a parameter set is placed in between a group of parameter sets, all sets that come after the newly placed one must auto increment.</description> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Reorder test parameter sets order</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var testId = current.getValue('test'); var atfTest = new GlideRecord("sys_atf_test");
// dont re-order param_set before a mass delete triggered by the parent sys_atf_test being deleted if (atfTest.get(testId)) { new ATFOrderUpdate().reorderAfterRemove('sys_atf_parameter_set', current); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-24 17:49:26</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>0552e6b4532313008cd9ddeeff7b125d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Reorder test parameter sets order</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Automated Test Framework - Parameters" source="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.parameters">4c38f4203cf1311068bcf327dfe37fae</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0552e6b4532313008cd9ddeeff7b125d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-24 23:57:12</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0552e6b4532313008cd9ddeeff7b125d"/> </record_update>
